name: uibuilder
author: Siemens Product Lifecycle Management Software Inc.

data.name: aw-avatar
data.template: <aw-avatar source="data.avatarImage" name="data.avatarName@inr" size="xsmall" action="avatarAction@inr"  full-layout="true" text-position="RIGHT"></aw-avatar>

labelProp.name: prop
labelProp.validationMsg: The label value starts with alphabets and underscore followed by alphanumeric and underscore.
